ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_AineFlowe.Name: Áine Flower
ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_AineFlowe.Description: Named for Áine, the Éire Goddess of Summer, Love, and Sexuality (pronounced Anya, or Awnya), the Áine Flower first blossomed around The Lake of Áine, in Éire. Give this to a spouse to declare them the primary caretake of the home. Or give it as a gift to anyone you love!

ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_Aphrodite.Name: Aphrodite Flower
ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_Aphrodite.Description: Named for Aphrodite, the ancient Goddess of Love, Sexuality, and War. Give the Aphrodite Flower to a loved one you want to make a baby with!

ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_LilithTok.Name: Lilith Token
ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_LilithTok.Description: Lilith, the Mother of Unwanted Children, gladly will take from you the child you give this to. This can never be undone.

ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_AineFlowe.Name: Áine Flower Seeds
ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_AineFlowe.Description: Áine Flowers grown from spring to fall, though, their traditional blooming date coincides with the Flower Dance! Takes 9 days to grow.

ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_Aphrodite.Name: Aphrodite Flower Seeds
ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_Aphrodite.Description: Aphrodite Flowers, like love, grow in any season! Takes 6 days to grow.

ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_Atagartis.Name: Atagartis Pendant
ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_Atagartis.Description: Named for Atagartis, the Mermaid Goddess. Give this pendant to someone you want to marry!

ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_CeresPend.Name: Ceres Pendant
ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_CeresPend.Description: In the valley, when one farmer wants to marry another farmer, they give them a special mermaid pendant which bears the colors of the parsnip!

ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_MermaidBo.Name: Mermaid Bouquet
ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_MermaidBo.Description: A bouquet of purple, pink, and blue flowers! Give these to someone you want to date!

ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_RoomieBGo.Name: Roomie B Gone
ApryllForever.CPPolyamorySweet_RoomieBGo.Description: Have a roommate you are tired of? This special candle will make them gone for good! Give it to them, and let the dark energies of this potent portent potray your parley!

Entries.AineFlower_reject: I... really do not feel close enough to you to receive this...
Entries.AineFlower_accept: Awww thank you!!! You are very special to me too!
Entries.AineFlower_spouse: Awww thank you!!! I love you so much too! I am happy to help any way I can!$h
Entries.AphroditeFlower_accept: ...!!!$6#$b#Of course! I would love to make a baby with you!$1
Entries.AphroditeFlower_notVillager: This is not an appropriate gift for this individual.
Entries.AphroditeFlower_alreadyGiven: You already gave an Aphrodite Flower to {0} today.
Entries.LilithToken_accept: This is so beautiful! I love this dark energy! Lilith's love makes me feel loved!$1
Entries.NPC.cs.4434: Nghh... what is it? I'm trying to sleep.$a
Entries.NPC.cs.4435: I just don't feel like getting up today.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4436: *sigh*... I just want to stay in bed.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4437: Nnnghh... what is it? Make your own breakfast.$a
Entries.NPC.cs.4438: ...$a#$e#I had a bad dream, that's all.$s
Entries.PolyamorySweet.GaveBirthToday: I am so excited to add our new little one to our life!$1
Entries.WifeGreeting: Hey my Love! It's nice to see you out and about!#$b#Seeing you always makes my day better!$6

RandomDialogue: Hey Love! Care to peruse my fine wares?

Entries.PolyamorySweetLantanaFarm/n ccBoilerRoom: jaunty/-500 -500/farmer 64 16 2 MermaidLantana 64 18 0/skippable/viewport 64 17 true/pause 800/speak MermaidLantana "Hey there, @! I'm Mermaid Lantana! I love your farm!$1#$b#So, you are probably wondering why a mermaid washed up on your doorstep!"/pause 300/emote farmer 8/pause 900/speak MermaidLantana "I just wanted to let you know, that since the minecarts are up and running, that you can now come to my little store at Lantana Lagoon, via the minecarts!"/pause 600/jump farmer/pause 1100/speak MermaidLantana "If you want to date someone, give them a Mermaid Bouqet! You can date every available consenting person in town, if you please!$1#$b#If you want to marry someone, you have to be dating them, and 10 out of 10 hearts relationship! You may then give them an Atagartis Pendant!"/pause 400/emote MermaidLantana 20/pause 500/speak MermaidLantana "Listen close, this part is important: you can only be engaged to one person at a time!$1#$b#Also, if you have a stubborn Roommate who will not leave, you can always give them the Roomie B Gone candle, Guaranteed to Work in 24 Hours or Less!#$b#That candle will not work for anyone you are married to though. They will think you are confused! You have to divorce them.#$b#Lovely talking with you! Have a great day, dear!^Lovely talking with you! Have a beautiful day, cutie!"/pause 300/emote farmer 20/emote MermaidLantana 20/pause 1200/end

Entries.summer_Wed2: I love that I live in the old farmhouse with you.#$b#The creak of a floorboard, the slow plumes of dust whispering through the rafters... There is so much scope for imagination here!$1
Entries.summer_Tue4: You're an interesting ${guy^lady}$, @. I'm so glad to have married you!$h
Entries.summer_Sat6: Summer might be hot, but...$h#$b#At least it means Autumn is the next season!$1
Entries.summer_Mon8: Pelican Town is so much better with you here!$h#$b#And here is a little something for you, to say I love you![226]
Entries.summer_Thu10: Wow, you look nice today.#$b#Glad I got you using a facial cleansing and moisturizing routine!$l^One of the benefits of being married to a woman is I get to steal your make-up!$1
Entries.summer_Fri10: I am so glad to keeping you from getting lonely on the ole farm!$1
Entries.Wed2: Oh, hi @. Taking a break from your work?#$b#Me too. Just pondering what I might do with the college degree I got online...#$b#Maybe I could get a work from home job if money ever got too tight?
Entries.Tue4: It's fun to run into you out and about!$h#$e#How is your day going? I hope you are having a nice time!$1
Entries.Sat6: You know, since you first rescued me from the bats in the cave, I have had some pretty crazy adventures down there!$l#$b#Don't worry, nothing too crazy! I stay super careful because I love you!
Entries.Mon8: Here! Let me read your palm!$h#$b#I see a vacation in your future, with your lovely purple-haired wife by your side!$1
Entries.Thu10: Hi.$l#$e#Do you feel like everything seems unreal lately?$l#$b#Not in a bad way, though.$h
Entries.Fri6: The birds were happily chirping today. Seeing them together makes me remember how happy I am to be with you!#$b#And here is a little something for you, to say I love you![226]
Entries.winter_Fri10: @, there's something I want to tell you...#$b#You are so lovely, and I am so lucky to be married to you!#$b#That's all!$1^I am so happy I finally accepted my true self, a sapphic, and married the prettiest girl in the world!$6
Entries.winter_Sat6: I've been daydreaming a lot lately...#$b#Oh! about you, of course!$h^About you, my lovely wife, and your sweet kisses!$1
Entries.winter_Thu10: Another year is almost over...#$b#So happy I will spend next year with you!$h
Entries.winter_Wed6: It must be nice not having crops to worry about this time of year.#$e#And that means you can hang out with me more often!$h#$b#And here is a little something for you, to say I love you![226]
Entries.fall_Wed2: Are we growing pumpkins on this year? Please let me have one!$h#$b#And here is a little something for you, to say I love you![226]
Entries.fall_Tue4: It's nice to be living with you!#$b#Don't get me wrong, I love my parents, but they never seemed to fully grasp that I was an adult until I married you!$2
Entries.fall_Sat6: Your hair looks cool today... did you do something different?^Your hair looks so beautiful! You are gorgeous, my love!$1
Entries.fall_Mon8: I never would have thought I would become a farmer's wife...#$b#But you know? It's amazing? *chuckle*$l^But you know? It is so amazing to be your wife! And so amazing that you are my wife!$6
Entries.fall_Thu10: I had an interesting dream last night, with you in it.#$b#It was a good dream.$h
Entries.fall_Fri10: I wish the season lasted a little longer.$8#$b#When the wind really picks up, I feel like a kid again!$1
Entries.spring_23: Well, tomorrow is the flower dance. I still hate that stupid white dress...$s
Entries.summer_27: We can't miss tomorrow's festival. It's one of the most beautiful wonders of the valley.#$b#And seeing it with you is even more wondrous!

Entries.spring_Tue4: Watching the world awaken from winter slumber to green life is the most invigorating tonic for the soul!
Entries.spring_Wed8: Spring breezes are the freshest scent!#$b#Maybe I could make a perfume like this one day!$l^Maybe we could make and wear a perfume like this, my love!$l
Entries.spring_Thu6: Foraging is a specialty of mine. Here is a fresh salad![196 609 610]$h
Entries.spring_Fri6: Sometimes, a strange feeling comes over me. My head becomes totally empty... and I feel completely at peace, even blissful.#$b#Hey, now! It has nothing to do with drinking wine!$h
Entries.spring_Sat8: Farming is so fun. I always had wanted to try it. Now I am living the dream!$l
Entries.spring_Sun8: If you ever find any interesting looking driftwood, I could use it.#$e#It would be special that you gave it to me.
Entries.summer_Mon2: I found some wild fruits this morning!#$b#Sorry, I ate them all!$1
Entries.summer_Thu4: The sounds and smells of the farm are great, aren't they?#$b#I am so lucky to live here with you!^I am so happy to have you as my wife and live on our farm together!$1
Entries.summer_Tue4: The simple things in life are best: a soft summer breeze, majestic clouds, a goblet full of Stardew Valley red!$h^The simple things in life are best: a soft summer breeze, majestic clouds, goblet full of Stardew Valley red, and being a lesbian in love with you!$h
Entries.summer_Fri4: I love to walk out into the forest... Pause... And simply enjoy the beauty of nature?#$b#It's easy to forget how incredible this world actually is...
Entries.summer_Sat4: The flowing water keeps our house a little bit cooler in summer.#$b#I can't tolerate heat very well, so glad for that blessing!
Entries.summer_Sun4: What should I do on such a warm, lazy day? *sigh*#$b#Any ideas?#$b#And here is a little something for you, to say I love you![205]
Entries.fall_Mon2: I love how many mushrooms there are here in the Valley!#$b#And I love it when you give me them!$1
Entries.fall_Tue4: I love the Autumn pallette... the warm reds, the yellows and oranges..
Entries.fall_Wed2: It's so nice to live by the river.#$b#I fall asleep next you, lulled to sleep by the soothing sound of water every night...$6
Entries.fall_Thu6: One of these days I'll have to make you a wild mushroom stir-fry.$h
Entries.fall_Fri6: I love cooking for you.$h#$b#Here is something special I made for you earlier today! [606]
Entries.fall_Sat4: Decorations accentuate the feeling of the season. I think it's a worthwhile tradition.
Entries.fall_Sun4: One thing I love about this place is that there are beautiful waterfalls.#$b#And you!^And my sweet wife!$1
Entries.winter_Mon4: I love the way everything looks when it's covered with fresh snow.
Entries.winter_Tue4: It gets pretty cold here sometimes...$s#$b#I just love snuggling up to you, though!$h
Entries.winter_Wed4: I saw a snow rabbit early this morning! They're rare, aren't they?
Entries.winter_Thu6: *Sigh*... It's hard to get fresh food in the winter.#$e#I bet your farm is pretty well stocked with food, huh?
Entries.winter_Fri6: Do you ever get cold in running around?#$b#Come inside if you want to huddle under one of my quilts and drink cider.$h
Entries.winter_Sat2: Hello, @. It's fun to see you out and about!
Entries.winter_Sun4: You should take a whole day off, now and then.#$b#Not only is it good for the soul, but in the long run, you'll actually be more productive!

Entries.spring_Wed8: There used to be only two things I liked about this town.#$b#One of them is the beach. The other one is you! *giggle*$h#$b#But now, I have really learned to love the nature here!$1
Entries.spring_Tue2: I wonder if any nice shells washed up on the beach this morning?#$e#This isn't the best time of year for shells, though.
Entries.spring_Mon6: I used to complain about this town being so small, but I've grown to like it.#$b#If it was much bigger it wouldn't feel like a community.#$b#We can raise our kids here with deep roots to nature and community!
Entries.spring_Thu6: I cooked dinner last night. It actually turned out okay!#$e#But I did make a huge mess in the kitchen...
Entries.spring_Sun6: I love looking over the beach! This place is lovely!
Entries.spring_Sat8: I'm glad that the flowers are starting to bloom.#$b#Those pink ones smell so good.$h
Entries.spring_Fri10: @, can we go on a camping trip someday?#$b#The most exotic place I've been is Zuzu city.
Entries.summer_Wed8: It's so hot today!#$b#Could you please give me some ice cream., my love?$8
Entries.summer_Thu6: Sometimes you stay in the sun a lot... But I don't want you to get sunburnt, my love!#$b#I just want you to be healthy!$1
Entries.summer_Mon6: I have been reading some books lately...#$b#I have been learning about how important it is to take care of our local habitat!
Entries.summer_Sun6: Nothing beats summer sunsets and chilling in the cool of the evening!
Entries.summer_Sat6: It seems like a good day to go swimming.
Entries.summer_Tue8: I love living in the country now.#$b#I see things much differently than I used to! I am so glad I get to live in the same place as my sister, too!$h
Entries.summer_Fri8: Oh, hi @!#$e#Do you like my look?$l
Entries.fall_Fri4: You look like you've been doing a lot of hard work.#$b#Why don't you take the rest of the day off?
Entries.fall_Wed4: If you're ever bored, come spend time with me!$l
Entries.fall_Thu6: I have definitely grown a lot since getting to know you.#$b#I am so lucky you like me!^I am so lucky you are sapphic too, like me!#$b#I love that we are together!^I love so much that you are my wife!$l
Entries.fall_Sun6: I love taking pictures in the forest!.#$b#All thanks to you, for helping me grow past my self-imposed limits!$h#$b#I love being with you!$l
Entries.fall_Tue8: I love the smell of leaves!#$b#I am learning an all new appreciation for Autumn!$h
Entries.fall_Mon10: @, I'm happy to see you today.$h#$b#You make me happier than a sunflower!$l
Entries.fall_Sat6: I just danced in a pile of leaves!#$b#It was so fun!$1
Entries.winter_Tue4: Hi @.#$b#Have you ever noticed how sometimes weird things happen on the farm?#$b#Like, I know I saw a Sasquatch smelling a flower last night!#$b#It was so cute!$9
Entries.winter_Wed6: I love living on the farm!#$b#I still like cute clothes and fashion, too. Just because we are farmers doesn't mean we can't be fabulous!$h
Entries.winter_Thu6: The winter sunset is such a lovely pallette.$h#$b#Such a romantic time of year...#$b#...what?$l
Entries.winter_Mon8: I wish it were warmer here in Stardew Valley.#$b#We could move somewhere else, but... I love this farm!
Entries.winter_Fri8: Do you think we will ever have
Entries.winter_Sat8: I'm glad you have less work to do in the winter.#$b#It's nice to spend more time with you!
Entries.winter_Sun10: @, you look rugged today. I like it.^@, you look pretty today. I love it!$l#$e#...$h

Entries.FlowerDanceFemaleAccept: You want to be my partner for the flower dance?#$b#Okay! I'd love to dance with you! <$h
Entries.FlowerDanceMaleAccept: You want to be my partner for the flower dance?#$b#Okay! I'd love to dance with you! <$h

Entries.Chat_DeclineProposal: {1} is disinclined to accept the proposal of marriage profferred by one {0}.
